title: Sombrio expands their clothing line… by adding complete mountain bikes!
content:
British Columbia’s Sombrio is a well-established clothing brand in the MTB world, but they’ve just made a major shift. Now they’ve jumped into the bike game with four new hardtail mountain bikes.
